post.body:
Director : Javad Matouri

Production Studio : Alzahra Animation and VFX Studio

Duration : 90 Minutes

Technique : 3D Animation

Genre : Family, Adventure, Comedy, Musical, Action, Darama

Progress : Pre Production Finished, Early Production

Suffered by illness in his short life, 5-year-old Jack, is about to enter the magical world and move into his only dream. While he is waiting to pass the heart surgery in the hospital that his survival depends on, his father leaves a broken lamp beside him. Change arrives in the shape of a mysterious Genie. Can the dreams come true? Is Jack about to jump on the adventure of a lifetime?

![World Cup](../../img/originals/2021-trophy/worldcup-01.jpg 'World Cup')

![World Cup](../../img/originals/2021-trophy/worldcup-02.jpg 'World Cup')
At the end of the World Cup Final, the captain of the champion team raises a cardboard cup among the relentless encouragement of the fans! Because the Golden World Cup is somewhere else, IN THE HOSPITAL!

![World Cup](../../img/originals/2021-trophy/trophy-01.jpeg 'World Cup')
The five-year-old ill boy on the hospital bed has an unattainable request/wish for the Genie of the Lamp. Something only a few people have been able to touch, the World Cup Trophy!

![World Cup](../../img/originals/2021-trophy/trophy-02.jpeg 'World Cup')
Jimmy Jumper, who has always been disgusted by the football fans, does a great job and his name will be shouted forever with honor in the history of the World Cup.

![World Cup](../../img/originals/2021-trophy/trophy-03.jpeg 'World Cup')
